refnamediv.refname: RFC CDK #16: Isotope.getAtomicMass() should be renamed to Isotope.getMassNumber()

refsect1.title: Proposal
refsect1.para: The method Isotope.getAtomicMass() should be renamed to Isotope.getMassNumber() (Or .getNucleonNumber(), but that is not proposed).

refsect1.title: Reason
refsect1.para: Mass number (or nucleon number) seems to be the accepted names for the information contained in the field which is currently accessed by the getAtomicMass() method. MassNumber can be found in several scientific dictionaries, e.g. those indexed on www.xrefer.com.
